name: c1
rules: When you take a treasure, you may pay a player 2 coins to take it from that player instead of the dragons.
title: Trevyn

name: c2
rules: When you take coins, take an extra coin.
title: Sophia

name: c3
rules: When the game ends, take an extra treasure from the dragon's hoard.
title: Andrew

name: c4
rules: Once during your turn you may pay 1 coin to the dragon to increase the value of an action by 1.
title: Mike

name: c5
rules: When you swap treasures you may swap 2 instead of 1.
title: Erin

name: c6
rules: You may look at dragons in the dragon deck, you pay 1 less coin.
title: Dwayne

name: c7
rules: During your turn you may swap 1 of your actions with the top card of the action deck.
title: Lee

name: c8
rules: You may pay 1 coin to a player to look at his hand of action cards.
title: Emma

name: c9
rules: You may pay 3 coins to change which of the revealed dragons are the active dragon.
title: Dan

name: Xc10
rules: X
title: Jesse

name: c11
rules: If you have the most coins at the end of the game, gain 5 extra points.
title: James

name: c12
rules: When you swap a treasure, you may pay a player 1 coin to swap a treasure with that player instead of the dragons.
title: Taylor

name: c13
rules: When you play an action that is valued at hate, only lose 1 treasure.
title: Scott

name: c14
rules: When you play a whine, the value of brag goes up by 1.
title: Chris

name: c15
rules: If you have no coins, you may take a coin as part of any action.
title: Berrett

name: c16
rules: You may reveal the next dragon as part of a Meh action.
title: Chad

name: c17
rules: When you count treasures for the purpose of determining who gets eaten, you are treated as having 2 fewer treasures.
title: Dustin

name: c18
rules: Before you draw you may swap the discarded card with 1 of the cards that are removed from the game.
title: Olivia

name: c19
rules: Your gold coins are worth 3 points each at the end of the game.
title: Isabella

name: c20
rules: When a new dragon is revealed, you may increase the value of an action by 1.
title: Lily
